sentences.en: an incomparable view of San Marco
sentences.cn: 圣马科美妙绝伦的景色

sentences.en: And the dress was incomparable, so rich and handsome looking and yet so dignified!
sentences.cn: 而且衣裳也是无比出色的.显得那么富丽 、 大方,可又十高雅!

sentences.en: Bessie Smith was an incomparable singer in her days.
sentences.cn: 贝茜·密斯在她那个时代是举世无双的歌手.

sentences.en: His income is incomparable with mine.
sentences.cn: 他的收入不能与我的相比.

sentences.en: It is both her incomparable strength and her ultimate limitation.
sentences.cn: 这既是她的无比的力量,又是她的最终局限性.

sentences.en: It is foolish to compare horses with airplanes. They are incomparable.
sentences.cn: 拿马和飞机作比较是愚蠢的, 它们根本不具可比性.

sentences.en: It was a performance of incomparable brilliance.
sentences.cn: 那是场精彩绝伦的演出。

sentences.en: Lazy bass line, lazier drums, lush violins, great piano and incomparable vocals.
sentences.cn: 懒惰的低音线, 较懒惰的鼓, 饮小提琴, 棒的钢琴和无比的声音.

sentences.en: Our incomparable quality enables us to charge higher prices than our competitors.
sentences.cn: 我们无与伦比的质量使我们得以收取比我们竞争者更高的价格.
菲比烘烤她最拿手的香蕉饼.

sentences.en: Swift's power of invention is incomparable.
sentences.cn: 斯威夫特有过人的想象力.

sentences.en: the incomparable beauty of Lake Garda
The incomparable pageant is below and about us.
sentences.cn: 我们的下面和周围是一片辉煌华丽的风光.

sentences.en: The opportunities available to our citizens are incomparable.
sentences.cn: 我国公民享有的各种机会是无法比拟的.

sentences.en: The views from the house are incomparable.
sentences.cn: 从房子里向外看到的景色非常优美。

sentences.en: This revised edition is incomparable with the earlier ones.
sentences.cn: 这一修订本不可与先前的版本同日而语.

trans.tran_cn: 无双的，无敌的，无比的，无可比拟，无与伦比
trans.tran_en: extremely good, beautiful etc, and much better than others
